bookseller/NN to/TO prepare/VB for/IN a/DT Second/JJ Edition/NNP of/IN "Willy/NNP Reilly."/NNP This/DT is/VBZ at/IN all/DT times/NNS a/DT pleasing/NN call/NN upon/IN an/DT author;/NN and/CC it/PRP is/VBZ so/RB especially/RB to/TO me,/VB inasmuch/JJ as/IN the/DT first/JJ Edition/NNP was/VBD sold/VBN at/IN the/DT fashionable,/NN but/CC unreasonable,/JJ price/NN of/IN a/DT guinea/NN and/CC a/DT be/VB its/PRP$ merits./NN With/IN respect/NN to/TO "Willy/NNP Reilly,"/NNP it/PRP may/MD be/VB necessary/JJ to/TO say/VB that/IN I/PRP never/RB wrote/VBD any/DT work/NN of/IN the/DT same/JJ extent/NN in/IN so/RB short/JJ a/DT time,/NN or/CC with/IN so/RB much/JJ haste./, Its/PRP$ popularity,/JJ however,/NN has/VBZ been/VBN equal/JJ to/TO that/DT of/IN any/DT other/JJ of/IN my/PRP$ productions;/NN a/DT greater/JJR encouragement/NN to/TO a/DT literary/JJ man,/NN to/TO a/DT novel/NN writer,/NN in/IN fact,/NN than/IN the/DT reflection/NN that/IN he/PRP has/VBZ an/DT honest/JJ and/CC generous/JJ tribunal/NN to/TO encounter./VB If/IN he/PRP be/VB a/DT quack/NN or/CC an/DT impostor,/NN they/PRP will/MD at/IN once/RB detect/VB him;/NN but/CC if/IN he/PRP exhibit/VBP human/JJ nature/NN and/CC CHAPTER/NNP XXIV.--Jury/NNP of/IN the/DT Olden/JJ Time/NNP --Preparations--The/NNP Scales/NNP of/IN Justice./NNP At/IN last/JJ the/DT trial/NN came/VBD on,/RB and/CC Sir/NNP Robert/NNP Whitecraft,/NNP the/DT great/JJ champion/NN of/IN Protestantism--a/NNP creed/VBD which/WDT he/PRP did/VBD not/RB believe--was/NN conducted/VBN into/IN the/DT court-house/NN and/CC placed/VBD in/IN the/DT dock./NN
